t: About 'Pay at Your Pace with Zip' - Amazon Customer Service
s: Pay at your pace using Zip on Amazon.com.au. When you use Zip to purchase goods on Amazon.com.au, Zip pays Amazon on your behalf and you can repay Zip back over time, as per the terms of your account with Zip. Amazon is not involved in the pay back process between you and Zip.

t: Worldwide Postal ZIP Codes - App on Amazon Appstore
s: Helps us to easily find the postal (zip) codes of countries all over the world. They can be browsed by country, area within country or search by country, area, postal (zip) code or parts of any. It's fun to know the postal (zip) codes of our country as well as any other in the world.
